Text.1: Stand where the cable shadow intersects the light shadow
Text.2: Aim at the highest steel support

Text.1: Stand in the corner next to the lamp
Text.2: Line up with the top of the building and the far left of the blue barrel

Text.1: Stand in the cardboard box corner next to the car
Text.2: Aim at the tip of the flapping cardboard

Text.1: Stand in the cardboard box corner next to the car
Text.2: Aim at the tip of the flapping cardboard

Text.1: Stand in the corner by Xbox
Text.2: Aim at the window on the left

Text.1: Stand in corner by the barrel at long
Text.2: Aim at the top of the red sign, run, and release when your crosshair is at the bottom of the sign

Text.1: Stand to the left of the third white line and aim slightly above the middle of the panelling
Text.2: Run forward and jump throw when your crosshair is at the center of the panelling

Text.1: Stand in this general area in A main
Text.2: Aim at the crease in the plastic cover

Text.1: Stand in this general area in B main
Text.2: Aim at the center of the top left panel

Text.1: Stand in this general area in A main
Text.2: Line up your crosshair with the left of the panels and the white/brown intersection

Text.1: Stand in this corner in mid main
Text.2: Aim slightly down from the line on the left of the middle divider

Text.1: Stand on the left of the doorframe of mid main
Text.2: Aim in the top right of the blocked up window

Text.1: Stand in the corner of the truck
Text.2: Aim between the E and the Y in the sign

Text.1: Stand against the wall on top of the thin white line
Text.2: Aim above the aerial and line up with the second spoke of the blue scaffolding

Text.1: Stand on the angled wall of the building
Text.2: Aim slightly at the right of the pole sticking from the other building

Text.1: Stand in between the two alcoves
Text.2: Aim up and to the left of the corner of the pillar

Text.1: Stand on the far side on the first step
Text.2: Aim at the center of the shape the wooden supports make

Text.1: Stand next to the dust bin in spawn
Text.2: Aim slightly to the right and below the antenna

Text.1: Stand in the right corner boxes
Text.2: Line your crosshair up with the left of the box and top of the cardboard flap

Text.1: Stand in the right corner boxes
Text.2: Line your crosshair up with the dark stripe of the cardboard box

Text.1: Stand in the left corner boxes
Text.2: Line your crosshair up with the left of the bar code and the cable support

smokes.Title: Cat corner smoke from B apps

Text.1: Stand in the middle of the black grated door
Text.2: Aim at the dark spot above the lamp

smokes.Title: Back left pillar smoke from B apps

Text.1: Stand on the left doorframe of the black grated door
Text.2: Line up your crosshair with the center of the window and the dark spot on the tower

Text.2: Aim slightly at the right of the pole sticking from the other building
